item.title: 尼日利亚计划暂停征收食品进口税以缓解通货膨胀
item.description: 尼日利亚正在考虑暂停对主食、药品和其他必需品征收六个月的进口税，以减缓这个非洲人口最多国家的通货膨胀。【原文：Nigeria is considering suspending import duties on staple food, drugs and other essential items for six months to slow inflation in Africa’s most-populous nation.】

item.title: 德国财政部长承诺减税 250 亿美元
item.description: 德国财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳（Christian Lindner）宣布，计划在2026年前减免230亿欧元（约合250亿美元）的家庭所得税，尽管他还在与联盟伙伴就如何填补明年的预算缺口进行争论。【原文：German Finance Minister Christian Lindner announced plans for €23 billion ($25 billion) in income-tax relief for households through 2026 even as he wrestles with his coalition partners over how to plug a hole in next year’s budget.】

item.title: 地中海地区野火风险达到极端水平
item.description: 在希腊和西班牙，野火的威胁已经达到了极点，风险也蔓延到了法国里维埃拉地区。【原文：The threat of wildfires is reaching extreme levels in Greece and Spain, with risks also spreading to the French Riviera.】

item.title: ATB 增设债券交易台，填补汇丰收购后留下的空白
item.description: ATB 资本市场公司（ATB Capital Markets）将在多伦多设立一个新的固定收益交易柜台，这家阿尔伯塔省政府所有的贷款机构试图填补加拿大金融市场整合留下的空缺。【原文：ATB Capital Markets is starting a new fixed-income trading desk based in Toronto, as the Alberta government-owned lender seeks to fill a hole left by consolidation in Canadian financial markets.】

item.title: 沙特阿美巨型石油公司发售成为本年度沙特最大首次公开募股的亮点
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司 120 亿美元的二次股票出售，为该王国本年度最大的首次公开募股抹去了光彩。【原文：Saudi Aramco’s $12 billion secondary share sale took the shine off the kingdom’s biggest initial public offering of the year.】

item.title: 适应制裁，俄罗斯五月石油收入增长 50
item.description: 随着原油价格的上涨和国家对国际制裁的适应，5 月份俄罗斯国家预算的石油收入比一年前增长了近 50%。【原文：Russia’s oil proceeds to the state budget increased almost 50% in May from a year ago, as its crude prices rose and the nation adapted to international sanctions.】

item.title: 芬兰希望欧盟提供溢油船应对影子舰队风险
item.description: 由于俄罗斯原油运输对波罗的海北部地区构成的威胁日益严重，芬兰呼吁欧盟采购一艘船只，随时准备应对该地区的石油泄漏事件。【原文：Finland called for the European Union to procure a vessel to be on standby for oil spills in the northern parts of the Baltic Sea, as Russian crude transports are posing a growing threat in the region.】

item.title: 交易商急于交易铜矿，而矿商正在套现
item.description: 一些最大的大宗商品贸易商对铜的激烈争夺，为矿商创造了谈判有利条件的机会，从巨额预付款到超长合同，不一而足。【原文：A heated competition for copper among some of the biggest commodity traders is creating opportunities for miners to negotiate favorable terms ranging from huge upfront payments to extra-long contracts.】

item.title: 阿提哈德航空与中国东方航空签署合资协议，拓展全球航线
item.description: 阿联酋国家航空公司阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways PJSC）与中国东方航空股份有限公司（China Eastern Airlines Co.【原文：Etihad Airways PJSC, the national carrier of the United Arab Emirates, and China Eastern Airlines Co. will create a joint venture to develop routes between the UAE and Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司以 4.5 亿英镑收购英国燃气发电厂
item.description: 道达尔能源 SE 同意以 4.5 亿英镑（5.75 亿美元）的企业价值从 EIG Global Energy Partners 收购英国的一家燃气发电厂，以补充其在英国的可再生能源资产。【原文：TotalEnergies SE agreed to buy a gas-fired power plant in the UK from EIG Global Energy Partners for an enterprise value of £450 million ($575 million) to complement its renewable energy assets in the country.】

item.title: 今日巴西五大热点话题
item.description: 预计四月份工业生产萎缩参议院投票通过对低于 50 美元的国际采购征税的法案。在 ADP 私人就业指标公布之前，纽约股市期货上涨，而印度和墨西哥市场在大选之后有所缓和。铁矿石延续跌势，金属回落。查看要点：【原文：Produção industrial deve ter contração em abril. Senado vota projeto que inclui taxação de compras internacionais abaixo de US$ 50. Futuros das bolsas sobem em NY antes de indicador de empregos privados ADP, enquanto Índia e México aliviam mercados após abalo com eleições. Minério de ferro estende baixa e metais recuam. Veja os destaques:】

item.title: 印度功能失调的电力系统对未来五年构成威胁
item.description:
中国要保持经济增长，就必须满足 14 亿人口不断增长的电力需求。夏季停电并不是一个好兆头。【原文：

For the country to keep up economic growth, it needs to meet the expanding electricity needs of 1.4 billion people. Summer outages don’t bode well.

】

item.title: 私募股权投资公司的最新套现举措：以所持股票抵押借款
item.description: 去年，Cinven 的客户得到了一个不受欢迎的消息：这家收购公司与一家实验室检测公司的融资进展并不顺利。客户非但没有得到意外之财，反而不得不投入更多现金。【原文：Cinven’s clients got some unwelcome news last year: the buyout firm’s financing tied to a lab-testing company wasn’t going well. Instead of getting a windfall, clients had to ante up more cash.】

item.title: 纳税人出资 38,280 美元的医疗保健服务助推纽约市就业热潮
item.description: 纽约市长埃里克-亚当斯喜欢吹嘘说，自他 2022 年 1 月上任以来，纽约市已经恢复了在大流行病期间失去的全部 30 万个工作岗位。当地官员指出，在过去一年中，纽约市及其郊区增加的工作岗位总数超过了美国任何其他城市地区。【原文：New York Mayor Eric Adams likes to boast that since he took office in January 2022, the city has regained all of the 300,000 jobs it lost during the pandemic. Local officials note that the city and its suburbs added more total jobs over the past year than any other metro area in the US.】

item.title: 上半年资产支持债务销售额达 1750 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 2024 年迄今为止，美国和欧洲已售出价值约 1750 亿美元的由抵押贷款等资产支持的债务，这将是该行业至少六年来最繁忙的半年发行。【原文：Some $175 billion worth of debt backed by assets such as mortgages has been sold in the US and Europe so far in 2024, in what is shaping up to be the busiest half of issuance for the sector in at least six years.】

item.title: 美国因比特币 ETF 和特朗普在民调中的支持率上升而重夺加密货币桂冠
item.description: 美国正在夺回其作为加密货币市场无可争议的领头羊的地位。【原文：The US is reclaiming its position as the undisputed top dog of cryptocurrency markets.】

item.title: 美国购房申请量创 4 月初以来最大降幅
item.description: 由于抵押贷款利率仍高于 7%，美国上周的购房抵押贷款申请量创下了自 4 月初以来的最大降幅。【原文：Mortgage applications for home purchases in the US slid last week by the most since early April as mortgage rates remained above 7%.】

item.title: 天然气储量骤降，哥伦比亚企业面临能源紧缺问题
item.description: 哥伦比亚最大的公司正在为未来几个月能源成本的飙升做好准备，因为天然气产量的减少迫使该国转向成本高昂的进口，以避免能源短缺。【原文：Colombia’s biggest companies are bracing for energy costs to soar in the months ahead as dwindling natural-gas production forces the nation to turn to costly imports to avoid shortfalls.】

item.title: Kaszek 领投巴西初创企业重整债务市场融资项目
item.description: Kanastra 是一家为资产支持证券基金提供后台技术的巴西初创企业，在由拉丁美洲最大的风险投资公司 Kaszek 主导的 A 轮融资中筹集了 2100 万美元。【原文：Kanastra, a Brazilian startup that supplies back-office technology for asset-backed securities funds, raised $21 million in a Series A round led by Kaszek, the largest Latin American-based venture capital firm.】

item.title: 援助无效，碧桂园房屋销售持续低迷
item.description: 碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co.’s home sales struggle dragged on last month, extending woes for the Chinese developer that’s already facing a wind-up petition.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。股市因宽松押注而上涨，印度股市反弹，雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）指出了全球最大的风险。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Stocks rise on easing bets, Indian equities rebound and Ray Dalio names the biggest global risks. Here’s what traders are talking about.— David Goodman】

item.title: AB CarVal 看准高风险物业贷款领域的 500 亿美元商机
item.description: 华尔街的一家另类资金管理公司正在加大对房地产领域的贷款力度，而这一领域甚至被一些私人信贷机构认为风险过高。【原文：A Wall Street alternative money manager is ramping up lending in an area of real estate that’s considered too risky even by some private credit players.】

item.title: 肯尼亚和塞内加尔重返市场，非洲迎来欧洲债券复兴
item.description: 非洲国家在中断近两年后再次进入欧洲债券市场，在对本国经济信心增强的迹象下，它们正试图整理好自己的资产。【原文：African nations are diving into the Eurobond market again after a hiatus of nearly two years, seeking to put their houses in order amid signs of growing confidence in their economies.】

item.title: 欧洲央行警惕银行私募股权投资风险，行业面临大洗牌
item.description: 在企业违约威胁不断上升的情况下，欧洲央行正在审查该地区最大的银行如何向私募股权投资行业提供贷款。【原文：The European Central Bank is reviewing how the region’s biggest banks lend to the private equity industry amid a rising threat of corporate defaults.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德称五年内可将 PE 业务规模扩大三倍
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）私募股权部门负责人阿努杰-兰詹（Anuj Ranjan）在接受彭博电视采访时表示，未来五年内，该部门的规模将扩大两倍。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management can triple the size of its private equity unit in the next five years, said Anuj Ranjan, the head of the business, in an interview with Bloomberg TV.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"的供应举措令仍在等待夏季到来的石油交易商心惊肉跳
item.description: 欧佩克+"出人意料地决定在今年晚些时候向市场恢复石油供应，这令实物货物贸易商感到震惊，他们表示，目前还没有多少证据表明全球市场出现了期待已久的改善，从而证明此举是合理的。【原文：OPEC+’s surprise decision to return oil supply to the market later this year has alarmed traders of physical cargoes, who say there’s limited evidence yet of a long-awaited improvement in the global market that would justify the move.】

item.title: 荷兰可能支付多达 30 亿欧元清理塔塔钢铁厂
item.description: 荷兰可能出资多达 30 亿欧元（32.6 亿美元）对塔塔钢铁有限公司的 IJmuiden 工厂进行绿色改造，该工厂给周边地区造成了严重的健康和环境问题。【原文：The Netherlands may contribute as much as €3 billion ($3.26 billion) for the green transformation of Tata Steel Ltd.’s IJmuiden factory, which has caused serious health and environmental problems in the surrounding area.】

item.title: 麦当劳 "巨无霸 "鸡肉商标在欧盟汉堡之战中被驳回
item.description: 麦当劳公司失去了其标志性 "巨无霸 "汉堡的鸡肉版在欧盟的商标权，因为法官裁定这家快餐巨头没有采取足够的措施来主张独占权。【原文：McDonald’s Corp.’s lost the European Union trademark rights to chicken versions of its iconic “Big Mac” burgers after judges ruled that the fast food giant failed to do enough to claim exclusive rights.】

item.title: 中国南方城市受托人起诉国有 Keepwell 提供商
item.description: 违约建筑商中国华南城控股有限公司（China South City Holdings Ltd.）的最大股东正面临 14 亿美元的诉讼，这与该国开发商广泛采用的模糊信用保护机制有关。【原文：The biggest shareholder of defaulted builder China South City Holdings Ltd. is facing a $1.4 billion lawsuit related to a vague credit-protection mechanism widely used by the nation’s developers.】

item.title: 多伦多房价下跌，挂牌房源滞留市场
item.description: 多伦多房价四个月来首次下跌，原因是买家撤出，挂牌房源堆积如山。【原文：Toronto home prices fell for the first time in four months as buyers pulled back and listings piled up.】
